s1.name: Road map
s1.subtitle: J2ME light Client
s1.p: After the C/C++ client library, a new MIDP client allowing Joram access from J2ME device will be released in September.
s1.subtitle: AMQP
s1.p: Thank's to third party users, the Joram team should announce soon the support of AMQP in Joram. It will allow the use of Joram from many client interfaceS and langages.
s1.subtitle: Security model
s1.p: A new security implementation with authentication based on JAAS LoginModule and User/Role access control rights.
